title: Almond crumble cake with cherries
ingredients: ['For the cake', '250g butter or margarine', '250g caster sugar', '4 eggs', '1 teaspoon almond extract', '150g self-raising flour', '75g ground almonds', 'fresh cherries, to decorate', 'For the crumble topping', '100g butter, melted', '100g soft brown sugar', '150g self-raising flour', '50g flaked almonds', 'For the icing', '225g icing sugar', '2 to 3 tablespoons boiling water']
